text: Tom McClung (4 April 1957 â€“ 14 May 2017) was an American jazz pianist and composer. He had released several jazz albums, both as a leader and as a sideman to other artists. He had played and recorded with musicians such as Archie Shepp, Yusef Lateef, and Marion Brown. He spent years residing, performing, and recording music with other artists in Paris, France. He was born in New York City. McClung died either on the early hours of 14 May 2017 at his Moulins-la-Marche, France home from lymphoma, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:American composers Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Tom McClung
